Additional Mythical NPC Seeding
None
No additional Mythical NPCs will be placed into the world over a normal DW campaign.
Slave purchase only
Mythical NPCs may be purchased from the Slavers' guild, but no random placement.
Full Seeding
Random Mythical NPCs will be placed into the world over a normal DW campaign.
Orcish Hordes Invasion
Orcish Invasions
Orcish invasions can occur at any time in the game.
None
No Orcish invasions will occur.
Delayed
No Orcish invasions will occur before 1000 AD.
Orcs
Orc
Orc
Orcish
Brutish and barbaric, the orcs are a strong race that some say came from beyond this world. Despite their barbaric origins though, they possess their own codes of honor and are fierce fighters.
Elves
Elf
Elven
Elven

Elegant, graceful, and often ethereal, the elves are race of beings that are more than human, whose origins hail back to the very dawn of the world. Once long-lived, their lifespans have grown shorter as time has passed, until those few who remain are as mortal as humankind.

When you arrive at the local Slavers' Guild, the slavemaster quickly calls out for an array of the best slaves. He assures you that you will be offered only the highest quality slaves, and inquire as to what sort of slave you was interested in purchasing, and assures me that they have just the sort that will suit my needs. All the slaves are trained for a purpose, he notes, adding hastily that, "Of course, you can use them for whatever purpose you desire once purchased." You consider, and ask to see...
Reviewing the slaves for sale
A strong male trained as a bodyguard.
A pretty female trained as a handmaiden.
Ask about truly exotic slaves.
Nothing catches my interest for now.
A Slave Warrior

The slavemaster brings out a strapping fellow, perhaps formerly a barbarian warrior of some sort. The slave is certainly strong, and his shirtless chest is rippling with muscles. He could be quite useful in a fight, whether in my defense, in the arena, or perhaps in other ways...
I'll take him.
Let me see some of the other options.
A Pretty Slave Girl

The slavemaster brings out a pretty girl, young and fresh, and certainly not too ill-used. She remains calm as you inspect her, keeping her eyes downcast. Her chest is of moderate size, but her looks are certainly pleasing overall...
I'll take her.
Let me see some of the other options.

The slavemaster nods furiously, and yells out for his workers and guards to bring up the special slaves. "These are truly unusual specimens, all very, very rare, from the far corners of the globe. Many have been thought to be but myth or legend, yet here they are..." He pauses, licking his lips a little nervously, before continuing. "Of course, the prices are commensurately high... but I'm sure you'll agree, they are quite reasonable nonetheless..."
Peruse the first exotic slave.
The slavemaster yells at his workers and guards to bring up the next special slave. "Apologies, but perhaps the next one will be more to your liking...."
Peruse the next exotic slave.
I think I'm done looking.

Word arrives from the local slavers' guildmaster. Business has been booming, and they have received a special shipment of slaves, including some truly rare ones, thanks to your skilled management and oversight of the realm's economy. The messenger informs you that the guild has sent your share of the expected profits
column3: or if you prefer, you can opt to take first pick of the slaves instead.

column2: Boom times in the Slave Trade
I'll come take a look at the slaves.
Not this time, just the gold.
A Mystical Kitsune

The slavers bring out an exotic woman who seems almost human, save for her fox ears, and several foxtails extending behind her. She possesses a strange, mystical sense about her. "This one is called a Kitsune. A fox spirit, she was a rather tricky one to catch, but well worth it," remarks the slavemaster.
I'll take her.
Not interested - Next.
I'll just take my gold instead.
A Brawny Orc

The slavers bring out an green-skinned woman with small tusks jutting from her lips, and massive bulging muscles. She looks like she's strong enough to pull a full cart, or perhaps break one in two. "An orc, one of a fabled race from another world, stronger than a bull, even," announces the slavemaster.
I'll take her.
Not interested - Next.
A Whimsical Neko

The slavers bring out an strange feline woman who features catlike ears, and a thin waving tail. "A Neko, or so they call her kind, found almost exclusively in the distant realms of the mystic east," boasts the slavemaster.
I'll take her.
Not interested - Next.
A Beautiful Elf

The slavers bring out a lithe, beautiful woman, almost ethereal in her appearance, with pointed ears poking through her hair. "One of the last of her kind, most likely - an actual live Elf," boasts the slavemaster.
I'll take her.
Not interested - Next.
A Heavenly Angel

The slavers bring out a woman with white, feathered wings, whose face is so beautiful as to almost be painful to look upon for too long. "An Angel herself, descended from the heavens, and brought here for your use," claims the slavemaster.
I'll take her.
Not interested - Next.
A Sensual Succubus

The slavers bring out a woman with tiny horns, whose sensual body all but screams sex and lust, drawing stares from all around. "This one bears the blood of demons, a rare and powerful gift, and now available to make your own," notes the slavemaster.
I'll take her.
Not interested - Next.

The slavemaster nods furiously, and yells out for his workers and guards to bring up the next slave. A few moments later, one of the workers emerges shaking his head, and informs you that there are no more slaves to be had at this time.
Oh well.

A Strange Wolf Creature

Your guards inform you that a strange wolf-man has been discovered outside your castle gate, arriving in the dead of night, and concealed with a cloak and hood. They bring you down to the dungeon cell where he is being kept in chains, for safety. Upon seeing you, he bows his furred head, and introduces himself, apologizing for the surreptitious nature of his approach, but he wished to avoid spooking the peasantry. He tells you that his kind is often hunted due to the crimes of the more feral of his brethren, which he is not, and that he has sought refuge at your court, in hopes that your rumored mystical nature will make you see the potential benefit of having someone like him in your service.
I could use someone as strong as he is.
Begone from my lands, and do not return.

Late one evening, you find yourself awoken in the middle of the night, taken by a strange feeling, perhaps from the lingering afteraffects of a dream. Dressing, you walk down the quiet halls of your castle, past the rooms of your slumbering courtiers, only to notice that the one belonging to your werewolf courtier has its door wide open, with the bed empty. Curious, you begin to look around the castle, wondering just what the beast could be up to at this hour. The silent halls offer no answer though, and you are hesitant to raise the alarm and look foolish if it turns out to be nothing. Finally, you descend down into the dungeons, examining the shadow-cloaked stone corridors and cells to no avail, and prepare to turn to head back, when suddenly a massive pair of furred arms grabs you from behind...
A quiet night in the Castle
This can't be good...

Before you can even blink, your arms are roughly bound, locked into some of the same chains that once held prisoners, and clawed fingers begin to rip and tear at your clothes. The smell of animal musk fills the cell, heady and powerful, as the werewolf's furred chest brushes against you. Your breath catches in your throat as his intentions become clear. You begin to struggle as you feel his thick cock brushing against your leg, but to little avail as he mercilessly strips you, ignoring your pleas to the contrary, seemingly overcome with lust.
